snippet.title: Lost Echo - Android Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Lost Echo is now available on Android, with 9 localizations!

In the near future Greg's girlfriend Chloe mysteriously disappears in front of him. He starts a desperate search for her. What happened? Why does no-one else remember her? Solve puzzles, explore fully 3d environments, interact with numerous characters and solve the mystery!

Get it now!

Google Play : https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.KickBack.LostEchoAdventure
App Store : https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/lost-echo/id693045097?mt=8&uo=4
Amazon : http://www.amazon.com/gp/mas/dl/android?p=com.KickBack.LostEchoAdventure

Soundtrack : http://kickband.bandcamp.com/

Follow us on Twitter : https://twitter.com/KickBackStudios
Visit our Website : https://www.kickback-studios.com/
